All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AppController
This class handles the button of the application and is called to display contents in the application centre.
CredentialsCouple
This class represents a couple of credentials username-password
LoaderController
This class handles every loader needed and provides an interface for easy and secure access.
LoginController
 
Main
This class displays the application to the user.
MainController
This class handles communications between Main class and the various controllers.
MarketClient
This class represents the client in the context of a client-server communication.
MarketServer
The MarketSerer gives all the services to the client Every time a server object is created: 1.
Product
This class represents a market product described by: id, name, price.
ProductsController
This class creates the products list screen (FOR SALE and YOUR PRODUCTS).
ServerController
This class handles some operations needed by the MarketServer.
SingleMessage
The MyMessage class represents the single message between client and server.
UploaderController
